text: Unibuke ubwo Issa mwene Mariyamu yavugaga ati “Yemwe bene Isiraheli! Mu by’ukuri njye ndi intumwa ya Allah yaboherejweho, nshimangira ibyambanjirije byo muri Tawurati, kandi nkanatanga inkuru nziza y’intumwa izaza nyuma yanjye. Izina ryayo rizaba ari Ahmad (ari we Muhamadi).” Nuko ubwo yabazaniraga ibitangaza, baravuze bati “Ubu ni uburozi bugaragara!”
